name: Fletchling

evolution.description: Fletchling can evolve into Fletchinder at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Robin Pokémon. These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.

abilities.name: Gale Wings
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds an additional +1 to hit when using flying-type attacks.
